dct_title_s: Hispaniae Novae sivæ magnae, recens et vera descriptio, 1579
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Cum Imp. et Reg. Mts. priuilegio dec[e]nnali." In Spanish on verso, with caption title "Nueva Espan̄a" and signature "6." Includes index, ill., and text. Appears in Spanish ed. of Ortelius's Theatrum orbis terrarum, 1588.
